title: Nominations Sent to the Senate | The White House
content: William Joseph Burns, of Maryland, to be Director of the Central Intelligence Agency, vice Gina Haspel.Gary Gensler, of Maryland, to be a Member of the Securities and Exchange Commission for the remainder of the term expiring June 5, 2021, vice Jay Clayton.Gary Gensler, of Maryland, to be a Member of the Securities and Exchange Commission for a term expiring June 5, 2026.Â  (Reappointment)###
